title: Dorsett Shepherds Bush announces new Shop in Style Package
text:
Dorsett Shepherds Bush announces new Shop in Style Package Dorsett Shepherds Bush announces new Shop in Style Package Details Category: Hotel   14:15 Dorsett Shepherds Bush, the four-star hotel overlooking Shepherds Bush Green, has answered all shopaholic’s prayers with the announcement of it’s fabulous new Shop in Style package. Guests will now have the chance to indulge in all that this contemporary, modern hotel has to offer whilst sipping on signature cocktails, a VIP shopping pass at Westfield Shopping Centre, and a complimentary afternoon tea, resulting in a stay sure to delight the most savvy of shoppers. 
Under the landmark glass roof, this seven-storey hotel offers Chinese-inspired bedrooms designed with a light and airy feel. Many of the rooms are interconnecting, ideal for families with young children, a number of which have single and double sofa beds. Shop in Style Package: · Accommodation in a Deluxe Room (breakfast included in Pictures) · Signature cocktail at Jin Bar · Bespoke Summer afternoon tea served in Jin Bar · VIP Shopping Pass to Westfield London Shopping Centre Price: £199 per person per night* (Bookings to be made before 31st December 2015, subject to availability)* Upon arrival, unwind with a complimentary welcome drink from Jin Bar in the Golden Atrium. With a selection of delicious signature cocktails to choose from, there is sure to be a beverage to soften any travelling woes. Ahead of a busy day, bargain hunters can enjoy an appetizing breakfast in Pictures Restaurant, a contemporary brasserie style restaurant with all dishes made in-house, with a specialty omelette station for orders made on request. Guests can then embark on the short journey across to Westfield Shopping Centre where the fun (and serious splurging) can commence! With the Westfield VIP shopping pass in hand, entitling holders to discounts of up to 25% from over 150 stores and restaurants across the centre, the scene is set for the ultimate shopping addict’s day out in London. All shopped out, return to the calm oasis of Dorsett Shepherds Bush and tuck into a wonderful afternoon tea. Those keen to explore more of the buzzing city of London can do so at ease. Shepherds Bush boasts an excellent transport and communications network, with the Central Line underground station and over ground station within walking distance and extensive bus routes starting on the hotels doorstep. To complete your shopping delight, pamper those tired feet at Adeela Crown Aesthetic Spa at Pavillion on the top floor of the hotel and indulge in some delicious Dim Sum from the highly acclaimed Shikumen Restaurant, which has an entrance in the lobby. With these undeniable treats right at your fingertips, there will never be a dull moment whilst staying at Dorsett Shepherds Bush and getting to know this trendy area of West London.
